Detailed Description

An interface to specialize for UCT.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

UCT::UCT ( double  c,
const std::vector< std::pair< double, double > > &  boundsList,
const std::vector< double > &  splitAccList_ 
)

Constructor.

Parameters
cThe constant used in the UCB1 formula: I_t(i) = mu_i
  • c * sqrt(ln(n_t) / n_i)
boundsListThe list of bounds (min/max) for each parameter.
splitAccList_The list of split accuracies of the bounds.

vector< double > UCT::run ( unsigned int  n,
std::vector< std::pair< double, double > > *  armBoundsList = 0 
)

Draw 'n' arms and return the mean of the parameters of the arm which has been selected by the UCBs.

Parameters
nThe number of draws.
boundsListIf specified, store the bounds of each parameter.
Returns
The mean of the parameters of the arm which has been selected by the UCBs.
